title: Crawler for Google places
description: This crawler search string on input on google maps and returns all information about found places.

searchString.title: Search
searchString.description: String will be search on Google maps. It is possible to fill Google Place ID in format 'place_id:ChIJp4JiUCNP0xQR1JaSjpW_Hms'.

searchStringArray.title: Search
searchStringArray.description: Array of strings, that will be searched on Google maps.

proxyConfig.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfig.description: Use Apify Proxy, you need to have some proxy group to get results on Google.

maxReviews.title: Max reviews
maxReviews.description: Maximum number of reviews for place. If you fill 0 or nothing all reviews will be scraped.

maxImages.title: Max Images
maxImages.description: Max number images per place. If you fill 0 or nothing all images will be scraped.

includeReviews.title: Include places reviews
includeReviews.description: If checked the crawler scrapes all reviews for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable reviews.

includeImages.title: Include places images (Very Slow)
includeImages.description: If checked the crawler scrapes all images for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable images. Crawling images is quite time and CU consuming.

includeHistogram.title: Include popular times
includeHistogram.description: If checked the crawler scrapes popular times for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable this.

includeOpeningHours.title: Include opening hours
includeOpeningHours.description: If checked the crawler scrapes opening hours for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable this.

includePeopleAlsoSearch.title: Include people also search [BETA]
includePeopleAlsoSearch.description: If checked the crawler scrape "people also search" for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable this.

lat.title: Viewport point latitude
lat.description: Use it with combination with longitude and zoom to set up viewport to search on.

lng.title: Viewport point longitude
lng.description: Use it with combination with latitude and zoom to set up viewport to search on.

zoom.title: Viewport zoom level
zoom.description: Use it with combination with point longitude and latitude to set up viewport to search on. You have whole world on map with zoom level 1.

maxCrawledPlaces.title: Max crawled places
maxCrawledPlaces.description: Use to limit places you want to get from crawl one search. If you fill 0 or nothing all places will be scrape

debug.title: Debug log
debug.description: Debug messages will be included in log.

exportPlaceUrls.title: Export Place Urls
exportPlaceUrls.description: Scraper will return only places urls without details.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Info
additionalInfo.description: Export additional info: Service Options, Highlights, Offerings,...

forceEng.title: Force English
forceEng.description: Force places to be in specific english
